page.title: 07GUILDFORD:CLUBS & SOCIETIES
page.content: We asked 60 people in the area what clubs and societies they belonged to. Three people did not belong any and one man belonged to two. Six people belonged to the Sports Centre, four to the Whippets and to NADFAS, the other groups had three, two or one members. Here is a list of the clubs and societies: {Adults:}Guildford Choral Society,Lions Club,Bowling Club,Rotary,Innerwheel, NADFAS,Weyfarers,Blackheath Choral Society,Guildford Aerobics Club, National Trust,British Antarctic Survey Club,Women's Institute. {Children:}Cubs and Scouts,Guides and Brownies,Sub Aqua Club,Pony Club,Duke of Edinburgh Scheme,Pit Farm Tennis Club,Bellairs School of Dancing, Guildford Sports Centre,Whippets Youth Group,Papercourt Sailing Club, Young Ornothologists Club.
